Satan Controls the Conscience Numbed by Alcohol. --The drunkard sells his reason for a cup of poison. Satan takes control of his reason, affections, conscience. Such a man is destroying the temple of God. Tea drinking helps to do this same work. Yet how many there are who place these destroying agencies on their tables, thereby quenching the divine attributes.--MS 130, 1899. (Te 79, 80.)
